name: Pinball Girls
summary:
"Pinball Girls" is a game combined with pretty girl, pinball and galgame. The story begins with the agreement that “me” signs an alliance with Cyrili to collect the "destiny energy ball" needed together. Along the way, you will transform yourself as variety of gentlemen and appear beside all kinds of 9 girls to help them achieve their wishes.
From now on, "destiny" will be in hand, everything will be changed by you!
